message:
I have a question l, i know that I can get the answer from Google 
But i decided to get the right one from who have an experience in that domain
Which skills i need to work in a global company like google, Facebook?

data.message: None, you probably won't work in any of them anyway, focus on other - more interesting - companies instead
I think you need to elaborate your answer ya Tarek Amr

I'm sure Tarek isn't trying to be pessimistic here. Working for Facebook requires extensive PHP Skills and other backend/frontend skills.They don't just accept people with basic experience (at least not anymore to my knowledge) so you have to be really experienced.
For Google, you can check Mohamed Taha's link.
Try focusing first on small or medium-scale companies to gain the required experience. Then apply for whatever company you like and Good Luck!

Okay, forget my previous answer. Here is a list of some of Facebook current openings

Director, Global Gaming Partnerships
Forensics Ads Analyst
Head of Consumer Marketing, Instagram 
Copywriter
Critical Facility Engineer 
Electrical Specialist  
Head of Automotive 
Data Protection & Privacy Counsel
Data Center Financial Analyst
Front End Engineer
Software Developer, VoIP (WhatsApp)
Market Researcher, Growth 
Art and Animation Designer 
UX Researcher, Ads
Software Engineer, iOS 
Documentation Engineer 
SDK Software Engineer
Satellite Communications Systems Engineer
Thermal Engineer
Search Ranking Specialist 
Language Manager, Arabic  
Data Scientist, Infrastructure 
Data Center Technician 
Open Source Security Engineer 

Now tell me if any of them is like the other, or if anyone can really tell you which of them fits you more. The likes of Facebook and Google are too big that they need various skills. You pick the field you like, see the job openings in that field and see what is required there and learn it.

Having that said, Google and Facebook are arrogant bitches, so most likely you still won't get a job there. Pick other - more interesting - companies instead

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TeCfTN1cfmI

I think Mohammad Tayseer can give us some insights :) ?
Essraa Abbas More interesting to him, interesting to the extent that he will dig their job openings and figure out what skillsets are needed there
ok... the answer didn't appear fully at first... that is y i re-asked
Thank you for your comments, i appreciate your help üòÉ

if you are targeting Software Engineering jobs you should have very strong skills in Programming and Algorithms ( ACM Level ) also they prefer MSc/PhD background, this will be in addition to all other general traits of a good candidate

I think you might like to read this, and actually, I cannot say I agree or disagree with it, it is just good to have that point of view in mind

http://fortune.com/2015/07/06/why-do-people-quit-their-jobs-at-dream-companies-like-facebook-or-google/
